content:
####
#### Example of using ToonEyes:
##
## >>> from ShowBaseGlobal import *
## >>> import SampleFSM
## >>> eyes = SampleFSM.ToonEyes()
## swap in eyes open model
## >>> eyes.request('blink')
## swap in eyes closed model
## ('Closed',)
## >>> run()
## swap in eyes open model
## >>> eyes.request('Surprised')
## swap in eyes surprised model
## ('Surprised',)
## >>> eyes.request('blink')
## >>>
